trans-unit.resname: P23·1 | Painter's Servant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a color.

trans-unit.resname: P23·1 | Painter's Servant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.
trans-unit.target: All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

trans-unit.source: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.
trans-unit.target: It gathers hues from the twilight mist so that its master can paint a better world.

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.
trans-unit.target: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

trans-unit.resname: P23·3 | Mycosynth Lattice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types.

trans-unit.resname: P23·3 | Mycosynth Lattice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.
trans-unit.target: All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless.

trans-unit.resname: P23·3 | Mycosynth Lattice | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.
trans-unit.target: Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

trans-unit.resname: P23·4 | Retrofitter Foundry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
P23·4 | Retrofitter Foundry | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

trans-unit.resname: P23·4 | Retrofitter Foundry | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: P23·4 | Retrofitter Foundry | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

trans-unit.resname: P23·5 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Name
P23·5 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.
trans-unit.target: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.

trans-unit.resname: P23·5 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
trans-unit.target: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.

trans-unit.resname: P23·5 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text | Paragraph 3
